Enter Moovit! Moovit provides riders with a one-stop-shop journey experience to help them get from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and real-time arrival information with ease so that you can plan your trip with confidence. Pay and validate your rides. Moovit is your personal assistant for all your transit rides! 

► Real-time arrivals. View real-time arrival information, which is taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains. Avoid wasting time guessing train times or bus times.

summary.label:
Has it ever happened that you have to meet someone and the person can't explain where he/she is? This app will quickly find the location of another phone by sending a text message request. Most phones manufactured after 2010 can accept this request, no need to install any additional app on the 2nd person's phone. It does not get any easier than this!

How it is working:

• User A wants to know a User B location.

• User A enters the phone number of User B into the app.

• The app generates a unique URL, and the URL is sent to User B.

• If User B clicks on the link, user A will see the location of user B.

Limitations:

• This is not a spy app. User B must agree to share the location with you.

• If User B has a device without GPS (desktop computer, tablet), the determined location may have a large accuracy margin (up to 5 km).

• In rare situations, when user B is behind the corporate proxy, the app can show the proxy's location, not the user's.

The user location is determined in three ways:

• E.123, E.164
• RIR
• W3C Geolocation API

Your Mobile Cloud Connection

— مزايا التطبيق —
** إكتشف اماكن جديدة **
• التطبيق يستخدم خدمة الGPS بشكل تلقائي لتحديد موقعك بدون احتياج الوصول الى الانترنت.

• البوصلة الاكثر دقة على الاطلاق تمكنك بكل سهولة من معرفة اتجاهات جميع المواقع المضافة.

• ايضا ستتمكن من خلال خريطة دليلة البر معرفة الشوارع و المناطق المزدحمة من خلال خدمة بيانات المرور.

** خدمات إضافية **
• من خلال تطبيق دليلة البر يمكنك بكل سلاسة حساب المسافات مابين اي نقطتين على هذا الكوكب الرائع.
